A modern, harbourside bistro in Tallinn's Noblessner district, offering inspired comfort food in a chic, industrial-meets-cozy atmosphere.

![Highlights](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia-cdn.tripadvisor.com%2Fmedia%2Fphoto-m%2F1280%2F31%2F12%2F54%2F66%2Fessen-trinken-mit-blick.jpg&w=3840&q=70)

from TikTok, Instagram & Reddit

A modern, harbourside bistro in Tallinn's Noblessner district, offering inspired comfort food in a chic, industrial-meets-cozy atmosphere.

"Outstanding food, very friendly service, and a location by the marina that's hard to beat!"

![Menu](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcoinventmediastorage.blob.core.windows.net%2Frestaurant%2F65d9d6666b0c98604179cadb93d2e02a2451620a28cd6d3b7fdf27238280ed5c&w=3840&q=70)

Most Popular Items

#### Consider sharing dishes

Portions can be small, so sharing is recommended for a fuller experience.

#### Visit during off-peak hours

Avoid longer waiting times for food preparation by visiting during quieter periods.

![Third hero image](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia-cdn.tripadvisor.com%2Fmedia%2Fphoto-w%2F31%2F12%2F54%2F68%2Fessen-trinken-mit-blick.jpg&w=3840&q=70)

#### Insta-Factor

## Highlights

Discover the most iconic attractions and experiences

![Innovative Beef Tartare](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia-cdn.tripadvisor.com%2Fmedia%2Fphoto-m%2F1280%2F31%2F05%2F2d%2Fe3%2Fcaption.jpg&w=3840&q=70)

### Innovative Beef Tartare

A unique take on beef tartare that's an explosion of flavor with creative textures. Served with sweet potato fries.

![Google Review](https://www.google.com/s2/favicons?sz=128&domain=google.com)
![Harbourside Ambiance](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia-cdn.tripadvisor.com%2Fmedia%2Fphoto-w%2F31%2F05%2F2d%2Fe5%2Fcaption.jpg&w=3840&q=70)

### Harbourside Ambiance

Enjoy a cozy and classy urban feel with trendy vibes in this prime harbourside location.

![Michelin-Recommended Cuisine](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia-cdn.tripadvisor.com%2Fmedia%2Fphoto-m%2F1280%2F31%2F07%2Fd1%2F59%2Fcaption.jpg&w=3840&q=70)

### Michelin-Recommended Cuisine

Experience creative dishes inspired by travels, with well-balanced flavors using fresh ingredients.

![The MICHELIN Guide Estonia 2024: Celebrating Culinary Excellence and Sustainability](https://itin-dev.wanderlogstatic.com/webPlacesListSite/15299)
![Estonia has its first Two Michelin Stars restaurant](https://itin-dev.wanderlogstatic.com/webPlacesListSite/102328)

## What Travellers Say

### Reviews Summary

Lore Bistroo generally receives high praise for its creative and delicious food, particularly the unique beef tartare and seasonal dishes. Diners often highlight the cozy and classy atmosphere, along with the fantastic harbourside location. However, some reviews mention inconsistent service, with a few instances of inattentive or unfriendly staff, and a note on potentially small wine pours.

"Lore just hits! Always great food, fresh ingredients, wonderful staff, great selection, and lunch specials are always on point as well. Packed with flavor, well balanced dishes and I haven‚Äôt had one dish that wanted cooked and/or seasoned perfectly. Such a cozy and classy environment as well and great location. Tons of seating and an event room. 10/10 recommend trying to this place any time of day."

Peter Farsai

"Creative and delicious food! The beef tartare is different from the traditional type: every bite is an explosion of flavor. Very friendly service and pleasant atmosphere. Highway recommend!"

Hui Chen

"We booked a table weeks in advance when we knew we were visiting Tallinn. We ate there on a Monday evening in the summer but the place was fairly empty. We were sat at the back of the restaurant in the main room and felt we were away from the atmosphere. The decor is really nice - modern, clean and industrial while at the sane time warm and cosy. As a vegan, they had no problems adapting the menu. As a starter I had a grilled asparagus with the a creamy truffle sauce and for a main meal had an incredible risotto. The frozen chocolate cake with berries was insanely good! Unfortunately the staff weren‚Äôt friendly or inviting and they were not generous with the wine. Tip! Buy a bottle otherwise you‚Äôll get a very tiny pour. When our waitress poured the wine, we assumed it was a splash just to taste the wine but nope!"

Scott

# Christmas party in Lore

Our Seahall can accommodate up to 60 guests, and the entire house can accommodate up to 100 guests. We are also happy to host smaller groups.

**Christmas menu**:  
‚Äì Focaccia with rosemary and seeds  
‚Äì Trout roe with charred potato, egg, mustard stems mayonnaise, and herbs  
‚Äì Slow-cooked pork belly with sauerkraut, potato gratin and Dijon mustard sauce  
or  
‚Äì Oven-baked trout fillet with celeriac-garlic cream and pickled Brussels sprouts  
‚Äì Sticky toffee pudding with caramel sauce, vanilla ice cream and blackcurrants

Price 45 EUR / guest

**Lore Experience**  
Lore experience is served family style as we believe that sharing food is a great way to come together to nourish the relationships around us.

-Focaccia with rosemary and seeds  
-Roasted salsify with burnt leeks, almond-olive oil cream and pickled caper leaves  
-Trout roe with charred potato, egg, mustard stems mayonnaise, and herbs  
-Grass fed beef tartare with sesame seed cream, hazelnuts, jerusalem artichoke and asian style sauce

-Pan-fried cod fillet with celeriac-garlic cream, pickled roasted onion, beurre noisette sauce, and curly kale  
-Roasted beef tenderloin with roasted carrot, pickled celeriac and chanterelle sauce

-Sticky toffee pudding with caramel sauce, vanilla ice cream and blackcurrants

Price 59 EUR / guest
